overview: Take 7 of the hottest and sexiest female performers. Make every scene a Double Penetration, and this is what you get! Lauren Phoenix shows why she's the reigning AVN Performer of the Year. See why Katsumi is every man's dream. Saana and Dillan Lauren show why they're both 'A' material. And of course Taylor Rain in her first ever lesbian scene, with superstar Jenna Haze and the beautiful and sultry Bobbi Blair. See Taylor get DP'd by the two hot lesbians.
title: Penetration Nation
